name: r/games in segoe UI, Frutiger, Dejavu, Helvetica
description:
Basically returns /r/games to the font family with which the theme was origionally released:

"Segoe UI", Frutiger, "Frutiger Linotype", "Dejavu Sans", "Helvetica Neue", Arial, sans-serif
css:
@-moz-document regexp("^.*reddit.com(/r/Games).*$"), regexp("^.*reddit.com(/r/games).*$") {
html body {
	font-family: "Segoe UI", Frutiger, "Frutiger Linotype", "Dejavu Sans", "Helvetica Neue", Arial, sans-serif !important;
	font-weight: normal !important;
}

body, .side h4, html body .side h5 , html body .side h6  {
    font-size: 16px !important;
}

html body .content .usertext-html body .md, 
html body .side .usertext-html body .md,
html body .side blockquote blockquote blockquote h6
{
    font-size: 14px !important;
}

html body .hover.pagename.redditname,
html body .thing .title,
html body .parent .title,
html body .submit-page .roundfield .title
{
 font-size: 18px !important    
}

html body .side .titlebox, 
html body #sr-header-area, 
html body #header-bottom-left .tabmenu, .tabmenu.formtab, 
html body #header-bottom-right, 
html body .pref-lang,
html body .side .sidebox .morelink,
html body .side .sidecontentbox .helplink,
html body .midcol,
html body .panestack-title,
html body .panestack-title .title,
html body .menuarea,
html body .commentarea .usertext-edit:before,
html body .markdownEditor a,
html body .commentingAs,
html body .usertext-edit .bottom-area a,
html body .comment-visits-box .title,
html body .footer,
html body .submit-page .roundfield,
html body .submit-page .infobar,
html body .submit-page .roundfield label,
html body #RESDropdownOptions,
html body #image-preview-list,
html body #image-upload,
html body .btn.right,
html body .wiki-page .pageactions,
body:not(.search-page) #search input[type="text"],
html body .searchexpando,
html body .raisedbox, 
html body .searchpane,
html body .hover-bubble,
html body .deepthread,
html body .morecomments,
html body .nextprev, 
html body .next-suggestions,
html body .sidebox .subtitle,
html body .parent
{
    font-size: 12px !important;

}

html body #header-bottom-right .userkarma,
html body .side .linkinfo, 
html body .side .linkinfo .number, 
html body .side .linkinfo .word, 
html body .side .linkinfo .shortlink, 
html body .side .subscribe-button.fancy-toggle-button.toggle a,
html body .side .subButtons span,
html body .side .subscribers,
html body .side .users-online,
html body .side .leavemoderator,
html body .side .titlebox .toggle,
html body .tagline,
html body .side .title,
html body .side .sidecontentbox,
html body .account-activity-box,
html body .tagline,
html body .flat-list,
html body .bottommenu,
html body .submit-page .roundfield #suggested-reddits
{
    font-size: 10px !important;
}
}
